 Indigenous Local Communities 
 We believe in developing an open and respectful relationship with local Indigenous communities and stakeholders. 
 Guiding principles: 
 
 Respect Indigenous traditions, their land and their environment; 
 Engage in regular and open communication; 
 Involve local communities with environmental compliance; and 
 Create employment and business opportunities. 
 
 We will: 
 
 Respect Indigenous lands and traditions by informing and listening to concerns; 
 Engage in regular communication about activities; 
 Involve in our environmental performance, including site visits; and 
 Create employment and  business opportunities
